channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Michael Caine
channel.desc: Michael Caine gives a masterclass on the craft of acting for the silver screen by conducting a workshop with five actors using scenes from some of his films.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Italian Job
channel.desc: Classic comedy caper starring Michael Caine. Cockney criminal Charlie Croker and his gang take on an audacious plan to steal a cache of gold bullion in Turin, Italy.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Talking Pictures
channel.desc: Celia Imrie takes a trip through the BBC archives on a forensic examination of one of cinema's most frightening franchises, The Silence of the Lambs.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Silence of the Lambs
channel.desc: An FBI trainee shares her nightmare memory in the hope of stopping a serial killer. Contains very strong language, prolonged violence and upsetting scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: On the Waterfront
channel.desc: Oscar-winning drama. A one-time boxing hopeful learns about responsibility through his love for the sister of a murdered docker. Music by Leonard Bernstein.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Art on the BBC
channel.desc: Art historian Leslie Primo explores the BBC archives to create a TV history of perhaps the UK's most beloved artist, JMW Turner.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Tribe
channel.desc: Bruce Parry attempts to discover whether cannibalism still exists amongst the Kombai. Contains some strong language and upsetting scenes.

channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 17 April 1998 and featuring Billie Myers, Ultra Nat?, Ben Folds Five, Robbie Williams and Run-DMC vs Jason Nevins.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, featuring Ultra Nat?, Savage Garden, The Mighty Mighty Bosstones, Busta Rhymes, 187 Lockdown, Tzant and Run-DMC vs Jason Nevins.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Beethoven's Ninth at the Proms
channel.desc: The Danish National Symphony Orchestra takes over the Royal Albert Hall in a monumental night of music, presented by trumpet superstar Alison Balsom.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Nicky Campbell presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 23 August 1990 and featuring The Human League, Tina Turner and Cliff Richard.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Noel Edmonds introduces Eddie and the Hot Rods, The Boomtown Rats, Thin Lizzy, The Adverts, Page Three, Deniece Williams, Space, The Floaters and a Legs & Co dance sequence.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Love Songs at the BBC
channel.desc: Compilation of some of the greatest and squishiest love songs by the likes of Celine Dion, Joe Cocker and Jennifer Warnes, Jason and Kylie, 10cc, Lionel Richie and Hot Chocolate.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Love Songs at the BBC
channel.desc: A stunning selection of perfect performances of love songs from the BBC's music archives, including the sounds of Nat King Cole, Shania Twain, Billy Joel, Ed Sheeran and many, many more.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Love Songs at the BBC
channel.desc: This third volume of romantic hits from the BBC archives includes classic tracks from the 70s, 80s and 90s, such as Meatloaf and Sting, as well as some 21st-century songs to swoon to.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Britain's Wild Places
channel.desc: Short documentary taking a look at a year in the life of a pair of little owls who set up home in an old orchard in rural Herefordshire.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Miss Marple
channel.desc: Miss Marple receives a letter from a deceased friend, leading her to try to clear the name of her friend's son.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Miss Marple
channel.desc: Miss Marple resolves to clear her friend's son's name and in turn finds that love can inspire murder as much as hate.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Dark Hearts
channel.desc: After Sab's capture, Group 45 takes in two new members and Pierre, a DGSE agent. Contains some violence and some upsetting scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Dark Hearts
channel.desc: The 45 must eliminate an injured survivor desperate to denounce Zaid to Moktar. Contains some strong language, some violence and some upsetting scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Newsreader
channel.desc: The News at Six team prepare for the general election and six hours of unbroken air time. Contains some strong language.
